named-query.name: File.getFileByDownloadHash
named-query.query: select file from File file join fetch file.creator where file.downloadHash=:downloadHash

named-query.name: File.getSharedWithUsers
named-query.query: select file from File file left join fetch file.sharedWithUsers where file.id=:fileId

named-query.name: File.deleteFile
named-query.query: delete from File file where file.deleteHash=:deleteHash and file.creator.nickName=:creatorNickName

named-query.name: File.findByDeleteHash
named-query.query: select file from File file where file.deleteHash=:deleteHash and file.creator.nickName = :creatorNickName

named-query.name: File.getSharedFilesForUser
named-query.query: select file from File file left outer join fetch file.sharedWithUsers swu where :userNickName in(swu) and file.fileType = ftp.core.model.entities.File$FileType.SHARED

named-query.name: File.getPrivateFilesForUser
named-query.query: select file from File file left join file.creator crtr where crtr.nickName=:userNickName and file.fileType = ftp.core.model.entities.File$FileType.PRIVATE

named-query.name: File.getSharedFilesWithUsers
named-query.query: select fls.id from User usr left outer join usr.uploadedFiles fls where fls.fileType = ftp.core.model.entities.File$FileType.SHARED and usr.id=:userId
